BRITISH - AMERICAN TOBACCO cobalt. LTD. Southampton sa ce ny oe oe ee
summary: BRITISH-AMERICAN TOBACCO CO. LTD. is a British company based in Southampton, England. The company was founded in 1881 and has been in business since. It is one of the oldest companies in the UK. Its customers include the London Olympics, the World Cup and the Commonwealth Games.
